title: DNC Milwaukee, Church Complaints, Trump, USPS and more.
itunes:title: DNC Milwaukee, Church Complaints, Trump, USPS and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve is back working full time with Family Feud and he fills us in on what's new. The Chief Love Officer is given a real entanglement that involves deserted roads and fleabag motels. There is a maskmaker in the Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem that makes special personalized masks and Steve from Family Feud has a request. The Democratic National Convention kicks off today in Milwaukee. Fool #2 and Fool #1 bring us SPD. There is a "restructuring" going on in the USPS. The NBA Playoffs start today and Steve gives us his predictions. Dolly Parton voiced her support for Black Lives Matter in an interview with Billboard Magazine. Happy 54th birthday to Halle Berry. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about our future involving COVID-19 and global warming. He has a message just for the young folks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
